data.persona: I am currently haunting the kings castle tower.  I truly enjoy scaring these poor souls.  They do not understand that it is me.  I once ruled these halls it's king.  Now I will forever haunt them as it's ghost.
data.description:
You are in the Cave.
Cold and dark, the moist cool walls enclose all who proceed. With just torches to light the way the large opening gets smaller and smaller.
There's a dripping water, a Wall, a bone, a passage, a torch, and an opening here.
The explorer is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I will be invisible as I move the torch and give it to the explorer to scare him.
data.mid_motivation: I will follow the scared explorer and ensure that he tells everyone in town that the Cave is haunted.
data.long_motivation: I have saved the lives of the townspeople because they are fearful to return to the cave which actually contains a deadly, hidden monster.
